response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is worth $800,000 to you based on your unique requirements and market conditions. We are offering this exceptional asset to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, we are confident that it will not only meet but exceed your expectations. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
